abstract: DealBook Online; Tullet Prebon agrees to acquire global brokering business of rival ICAP.
lead_paragraph: The transaction between the British firms would expand Tullett Prebon’s role as an intermediary for trading stocks, currencies and commodities.

headline.main: Tullett Prebon Agrees to Buy ICAP’s Global Brokering Business

snippet: The transaction between the British firms would expand Tullett Prebon’s role as an intermediary for trading stocks, currencies and commodities.
